The News of the World's royal correspondent Clive Goodman was jailed in 2007 for conspiracy to access mobile phone messages involving Princes David Cameron and Harry. Andy Coulson confirmed his resignation in a statement on Friday, saying that the continued coverage of events during his time as the editor of` News of the World' had made it difficult for him to give the 110 per cent needed in this role .''
